p: Fruit volatile oil, the main constituent obtained from the plant, contains trans-anethole as the principle component as well as cis-anethole, estragole, γ-himachalene, eugenol derivatives, carvone, β-caryophyllene, α-cuparene, β-bisabolene, p-anisaldehyde, and other terpenic compounds.[11] On the other hand, flavonoids such as quercetin 3-glucuronide, rutin, luteolin derivatives, isoorientin, apigenin derivatives and isovitexin as well as lignin-carbohydrate protein complexes and phenolic glycosides also exist anise fruit extract.[121314]
